title: Cloudant gives 30 days notice before termination

tosdr.case: they give 30 days notice before closing your account
tosdr.tldr: Although Cloudant reserves the right to restrict, suspend or terminate their TOS and your access to their service at any time for any or no reason, they do give 30 days prior notice. However, they can change your password, username, or unique identifier at any time, for any reason.
